org.osmdroid.views.overlay.gestures

Interface RotationGestureDetector.RotationListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RotationGestureOverlay
    Enclosing class:
    RotationGestureDetector

    public static interface RotationGestureDetector.RotationListener
    heads up, this class is used internally by osmdroid, you're welcome to use but it the interface RotationGestureDetector.RotationListener will not fire as expected. It is used internally by osmdroid. If you want to listen for rotation changes on the MapView then use MapView.setMapListener(MapListener) and check for MapView.getMapOrientation() See https://github.com/osmdroid/osmdroid/issues/628
